title: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time.  la
body: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts at this time. Please wait 24 hours and try again later. It's an error where I can't buy rp! Does anybody have a fix for this? I really want vi ;-;

replies.body: It sounds like your method of payment may have timed out or hit the limit of attempts.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can take a look and find what's happening.  We'll reply back asap!
